wikipedia_page.main: Michael G Hanna (born 1963 in Leeds, England) is Director of the UCL Institute of Neurology, University College London and professor in clinical neurology and consultant neurologist at the National Hospital for Neurology and Neurosurgery, Queen Square, London, and also Director of the Medical Research Council (MRC) Centre for Neuromuscular Disease.

response: * Michael Hanna (sportsman) (born 1926), cricketer and rugby union player
